title.rendered: Convergences call for contributions: come and join the 3Zero movement!

content.rendered:
Convergences is happy to launch its call for contributions to the 9th edition of the Convergences World Forum, held in Paris from the 5th to 7th of September 2016.

To be part of this global movement and to commit with us to a “Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty” World, we suggest different possibilities:

  • Co-organise a session: support you working themes, alone or along with one of you partners, invite speakers and collaborate closely with the Convergences staff to organise a conference or a workshop among the 50 sessions of the Convergences World Forum.
    For further details, please check the call for call the guidelines for contributors.
  • Showcase your commitments at the Professional Marketplace: give visibility to your action and meet your future collaborators and partners, along with 40 organisations from both the public and the private sectors, solidarity-based actors and academics!
    For further details, please check the call for call the guidelines for contributors.

Be part of the Convergences World Forum 2016 and built with us a “Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty” World!

Submit your contribution until the 28th of March 2016.
